summary: Client asked Sarah to set a vision meeting; the PM asked for a project name. QA, Architect, and Developer did not provide input.

actions.task: Schedule the vision meeting requested by the client

risks.risk: No project name decided and key roles (QA, Architect, Developer) did not provide input, risking unclear scope and delayed planning
risks.mitigation: PM to propose a project name and circulate it for feedback; schedule the vision meeting and request pre-meeting input from QA, Architect, and Developer.
